price: Isaan lamaan irraa waadaan jalqabaa yeroo dhufe, gabroota Nuuf ta’an kan lolatti cimaa isin irratti ergine. Isaan manneen keessa ni deddeebi’an (nisakatta'an). (Waadichis) waadaa raawwatamaa ta’eera
arabic: فَإِذَا جَآءَ وَعۡدُ أُولَىٰهُمَا بَعَثۡنَا عَلَيۡكُمۡ عِبَادٗا لَّنَآ أُوْلِي بَأۡسٖ شَدِيدٖ فَجَاسُواْ خِلَٰلَ ٱلدِّيَارِۚ وَكَانَ وَعۡدٗا مَّفۡعُولٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: fa-idhā jāa waʿdu ūlāhumā baʿathnā ʿalaykum ʿibādan lanā ulī basin shadīdin fajāsū khilāla al-diyāri wakāna waʿdan mafʿūlan
